sentences.cn: 极具说服力的求助呼吁

sentences.en: An eloquent speaker is one skilled in the use of words.
Fences , sheds , everything had a ruined look, and were eloquent of poverty.
sentences.cn: 篱笆, 窝棚,什么都七倒八歪,叫你一眼就瞧出那穷形窘状.

sentences.en: He addressed the audience in an eloquent speech.
sentences.cn: 他对听众讲起话来滔滔不绝.

sentences.en: He was eloquent about his love of books.
sentences.cn: 他说起自己对书的喜爱来就会停不住嘴。

sentences.en: He was so eloquent that he cut down the finest orator.
sentences.cn: 他能言善辩,胜过最好的演说家.
她的热情使她能言善辩.

sentences.en: I heard him make a very eloquent speech at that dinner.
sentences.cn: 在那次晚宴上，我听到他作了一番非常有说服力的陈词。

sentences.en: I wish to thank you for your very gracious and eloquent remarks.
sentences.cn: 我要感谢你的非常盛情和雄辨的讲话.

sentences.en: My cousins, full of exhilaration, were so eloquent in narrative and comment.
sentences.cn: 我的两个表姐, 满心喜悦, 滔滔不绝地叙述和评论着.

sentences.en: My mother waxed eloquent on the theme of wifely duty.
The speaker made an eloquent appeal for human rights.
sentences.cn: 该发言人就人权问题发出了强有力的呼吁.

sentences.en: These ruins are an eloquent reminder of the horrors of war.
sentences.cn: 这些废墟形象地提醒人们不要忘记战争的恐怖.

sentences.en: With them she is so playful , pleasant, and eloquent.
sentences.cn: 她同他们在一起,显得那么爱开玩笑,快快活活, 口若悬河.

sentences.en: Words were not heeded here; and silence was more eloquent.
sentences.cn: 在这里,言语是不足道的, 沉默更有表达力.

sentences.en: Yes, Churchill's words are very eloquent, very touching, very spiritual.
sentences.cn: 不错, 邱吉尔的话非常有说服力, 非常感人, 非常鼓舞人心.

trans.tran_cn: 口才流利的，有说服力的，传神的
trans.tran_en: able to express your ideas and opinions well, especially in a way that influences people
